title: upon me by section 1(5) of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 24 of 2023).

title: upon me by section 1(5) of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 4. The 7th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7 of
text_raw:
4. The 7th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7 of 

the Act of 2023 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 July, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th July, 2024.
